text:
Oh, there's a game corner after all.
Shall we stop by?

That's because it's the order of the world,
Natsuha-chan...!

Taking a hot bath,
drinking a cold beverage with a "kyu" sound...

Yeah yeah! After lounging around,
we'll indulge in some gaming...! It's fun~!

It's a form of beauty, isn't it...!
I definitely want to try it! Which one do you recommend?

How about that one? The one where
you continuously hit the sharks that come out.

That sounds great!
It's a classic, isn't it!

I see...
Then, let's compete to see who can hit the most!
Haha, looks like we're going to break a sweat again.
